channel.title: Ambiguity on Linguistrix
channel.description: Recent content in Ambiguity on Linguistrix

item.title: Not bashful to admit that I didn't know what it meant
item.description: Quick question. Answer instictively without trying to over-analyze. The word bashful is closest in meaning to: A) Shy B) Arrogant About 6 years ago, I wrote about how I had discovered that I had been pronouncing awry, well, differently. I had another such moment of surprise last night, when I realized that the word bashful doesn’t mean what I used to this it does.
